name: HENTAI DANCE
description:
Dancing? This is very easy!
Try this HENTAI DANCE game!
You only need 4 keys (arrows), try to go through 9 levels, 3 different speeds. 1 location - dance floor, the feeling of a fun party.
9 different soundtracks, all with different performance techniques, 9 different styles of performance, and speed of execution.
Try it yourself, forgive all 9 levels!
The classic game, you need to press the keys on time, the arrows on the keyboard. Explosive soundtracks, explosive arrows, explosive combination! Try it and you!
